Sentencas: We prepared Ba substituted lanthanum silicate (La10-XBaXSi6O27-X/2) and examined the effect of Ba substitution on the crystal structure and conductivity.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity of apatite-type solid electrolyte material, La10-XBaXSi6O27-X/2 (X=0-1), and its fuel cell performance

Sentencas: The X-ray diffraction (XRD) results for a series of compositions showed that Ba ion can occupy the La site of an apatite structure with the composition La10-XBaXSi6O27-X/2 (X=0-1).
Titulo: Ionic conductivity of apatite-type solid electrolyte material, La10-XBaXSi6O27-X/2 (X=0-1), and its fuel cell performance

Sentencas: Rietveld analysis of the synchrotron XRD profiles revealed Ba occupation in the La 4f site rather than the La 6h site and a decrease in the occupation factors of the oxide ions of the SiO4 tetrahedra.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity of apatite-type solid electrolyte material, La10-XBaXSi6O27-X/2 (X=0-1), and its fuel cell performance

Sentencas: The conductivity of La10-XBaXSi6O27-X/2 exhibited a maximum at X=0.6 and the value was the same as that of YSZ (8 mol% Y2O3 doped ZrO2) at 750 degrees C.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity of apatite-type solid electrolyte material, La10-XBaXSi6O27-X/2 (X=0-1), and its fuel cell performance

Sentencas: On the other hand, the activation energy of about 50 kJ mol(-1) for La9.4Ba0.6Si6O26.7 was smaller than that of YSZ.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity of apatite-type solid electrolyte material, La10-XBaXSi6O27-X/2 (X=0-1), and its fuel cell performance

Sentencas: Thus the conductivity of La9.4Ba0.6Si6O26.7 was a higher than those of YSZ below 750 degrees C.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity of apatite-type solid electrolyte material, La10-XBaXSi6O27-X/2 (X=0-1), and its fuel cell performance

Sentencas: The conductivity parallel to the c-axis which is attributed to the 2a site oxide ions migration is known to be dominant in La10Si6O27.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity of apatite-type solid electrolyte material, La10-XBaXSi6O27-X/2 (X=0-1), and its fuel cell performance

Sentencas: However, Ba substitution seems to produce oxygen vacancies and create another pathway for oxide ions perpendicular to the c-axis.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity of apatite-type solid electrolyte material, La10-XBaXSi6O27-X/2 (X=0-1), and its fuel cell performance

Sentencas: The increase in the pathways leads to an increase in the conductivity.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity of apatite-type solid electrolyte material, La10-XBaXSi6O27-X/2 (X=0-1), and its fuel cell performance

Sentencas: We also reported the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) performance of La10-XBaXSi6O27-X/2 with a maximum power density of 65 mW cm(-2) using La0.9Sr0.1CoO3-delta as a cathode and NiO-SDC (Sm doped CeO2) as an anode.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity of apatite-type solid electrolyte material, La10-XBaXSi6O27-X/2 (X=0-1), and its fuel cell performance
